description: The [Bazar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0534) loader has named malicious shortcuts "adobe" and mimicked communications software.(Citation: Cybereason Bazar July 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Team9 June 2020)(Citation: CrowdStrike Wizard Spider October 2020)
